column3: Welcome to the Carline Canopy. Should you need help with anything, please don't hesitate to ask.
Whatever needs doing, really─though I spend most of my time serving or welcoming visitors to the Adventurers' Guild.
I first stumbled into the Carline Canopy after the Calamity, having lost my family, my livelihood, and the will to carry on.
There were times when my grief was so crippling, I could barely speak. But Mother Miounne gave me a purpose and a place to heal, and here I've stayed.
Ah, I once asked Miounne the very same question. She told me she simply liked the flower.
The look in her eyes when she said it, though... Well, I suppose we all have our secrets.
What would you like to know?
Why is it called the “Carline Canopy”?
